events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to customer receiving the wrong product.
An agent has been assigned to handle the customer’s refund request for the incorrect item.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the mix-up with your order. I’m here to help you with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have attached a photo showing I received a different product than what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund immediately and send you a prepaid return label to send the wrong item back.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate your help and will send the item back as soon as I receive the return label.
Your refund has been initiated, and you should receive the return label via email shortly. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
We are following up to confirm that you have received the refund and the return process went smoothly. Do get in touch if there are any issues.
Since your refund was successfully processed and the return completed, we have now closed your support case. Thank you for contacting us.
We have sent a short survey to help us improve our service. Your feedback would be greatly appreciated.
